title: Unable to Connect to Server
body:
"Unable to connect to the server. Please check you network connection and attempt to reconnect your game."

RITO, plz Fix.
fully connected to the internet, exited and restarted client, restarted wifi, restarted compute, same thing.
I swear if i get put into leaver buster AGAIN for this...

and i was playing fine a few hours ago, idk wht the problem is.
restarted the client 8 times already.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: If you've gotten a leaverbuster once for these disconnects already, it might be a good time to take a step back and address this before you end up getting punished for disconnecting again. Even though your internet is working fine outside of League, that doesn't necessarily mean it's not having a few problems. Make sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might not be setup quite right, and let me know how that helps.
